metadata.title: CVE-2022-48958 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ethernet: aeroflex: fix potential skb leak in greth_init_rings()The greth_init_rings() function won't free the newly allocated skb whendma_mapping_error() returns error, so add dev_kfree_skb() to fix it.Compile tested only.

criterions.comment: linux package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
